dist.hmm

Interface HiddenMarkovModel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ModularHiddenMarkovModel, SimpleHiddenMarkovModel, SimpleMarkovDecisionProcess

    public interface HiddenMarkovModel
extends java.io.Serializable
    The abstraction of a hidden markov model
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Guillory gtg008g@mail.gatech.edu

        void estimateIntialStateDistribution(double[][] expectations,
                                     DataSet observation)
        Match the initial state distribution to the given expectations for the initial observation data
        Parameters:
        expectations - [k][i] is the expected times in state i initially for observation sequence k

      • estimateTransitionDistribution

        void estimateTransitionDistribution(int i,
                                    double[][] expectations,
                                    DataSet observations)
        Match the transitions in state i to the given expectations for the transition observation data
        Parameters:
        i - the start state
        expectations - the expected transitions [t][j] for time t to state j
        sequence - the transition observatiosn
        sequence - the observation sequence
